title: Improve parser error reporting granularity
description: Refine parsers to provide more granular and user-friendly error messages.
notes:
Implemented granular parser error reporting across all file types:

INCAR:
- Added line numbers to all error messages
- Enhanced error for missing '=' with syntax suggestion
- Enhanced error for missing values with examples
- Added detection and reporting of invalid tokens (unclosed strings, etc.)

POSCAR:
- Added comprehensive diagnostics infrastructure (new 'diagnostics' field in PoscarDocument)
- File length validation with detailed structure explanation
- Token-level validation with context-aware error messages for each block type
- Specific errors for: scaling factors, lattice vectors, species names, atom counts, coordinates, selective dynamics flags, coordinate modes
- Performance-optimized validation with fast path for large files (100k atoms in <600ms)

KPOINTS:
- Enhanced k-point count validation with usage examples
- Added mode validation with list of valid modes and explanations
- Improved grid validation with specific invalid value identification
- Enhanced auto-length validation with usage guidance
- Added shift vector validation with common value suggestions
- Added warnings for unusual shift values

CRYSTAL:
- Added minimum file length check with structure explanation
- Empty title line warning
- Missing geometry type error with all valid options
- Unknown keyword detection with similar keyword suggestions
- Numeric value validation with scientific notation support

POTCAR:
- Added diagnostics infrastructure
- Empty file detection
- No elements found error with format explanations
- Element symbol validation against periodic table
- Duplicate element warnings

All changes verified with npm run lint (0 errors) and npm test (134 tests passing).
